name: ZModeler 3D File
summary: Learn about .Z3D files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Z3D files can be exported to various 3D image formats, including the 3D Studio .3DS and Wavefront .OBJ formats. ZModeler also supports car models formats from various racing games, including Need for Speed 3: Hot Pursuit, Need for Speed: Shift, Grand Theft Auto 4, Grand Theft Auto San Andreas, and others.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
